column4: Has anyone installed Skype? I'm having trouble finding the libqt3c102-mt package.
so I'm looking for the wrong package?
libqt3c102-mt is correct, and it is indeed in ubuntu
if that doesn't work, your /etc/apt/sources.list is misconfigured
anything is possible. I did download the .deb package and started following instructions on the ubuntu wiki page. I'll try what you just said though.
well, I tried and nothing has helped me yet. You said " if that doesn't work, your /etc/apt/sources.list is misconfigured". What's left for me to try now?
what sort of machine is it?
try asking on the mailing list
